name: Dragon Force
description:
Dragon Force is a RPG-strategy game developed by SEGA and JForce Games. It came out on 29-03-1996. It was published by SEGA. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Dragon Force is available on SEGA Saturn.
Hiroshi Aso, Makoto Oshitani and Tatsuo Yamada produced the game. Tomoyuki Ito directed the game. It was scored by Tatsuyuki Maeda.
